data.eml:eml: A new late Cenozoic species of Abertella (Echinoidea: Clypeasteroida) from Patagonia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kroh, Andreas, Mooi, Rich, Río, Claudia Del, Neumann, Christian (2013): A new late Cenozoic species of Abertella (Echinoidea: Clypeasteroida) from Patagonia. Zootaxa 3608 (5): 369-378, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3608.5.5
